overview:
Joel Resnicow is the CEO of Rexly, which he co-founded with Bradley Lautenbach and Kyle Fleming. He is a digital media veteran/refugee with product management, business development and analytics experience at ABC Digital, Hulu and Twitter. He believes that data-driven decision-making and UX-obsessed design are the keys to success in consumer internet. (If you disagree, please provide the relevant data)

Joel graduated from the Stanford Graduate School of business (MBA) and Yale University (BA, Psychology & Philosophy).
